divs: Sighting DetailsI was just returning from a walk at night when at about 9:30 PM, I saw a white UFO almost straight above me or to the west. I would guess the altitude to be between 70 and 90 degrees above the horizon. I thought it was a satellite at first. I lost sight of it at about 9:35 PM or 9:40 PM or so, but when I lost sight of it, it was still at high altitude, to the north, at about 45 degrees above the horizon. I looked at a satellite passing chart at www.heavens-above.com for sightings above magnitude 5.0, but no objects listed fit what I saw.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Northville
There were no other sightings in Northville on or around September 4th 2013
